description: This file defines an Angular component for displaying detailed information about a recipe, including its image, title, description, ingredients, and steps. It handles loading states and errors, and fetches data from a service based on route parameters.

classes.name: RecipeDetailComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for displaying detailed information about a specific recipe, including image, title, description, ingredients, and instructions. It fetches data from a service based on the route parameter and manages loading and error states.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes component state by extracting recipe ID from route and initiating data fetch.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches recipe data from the RecipeService using the provided ID and updates component state based on success or error.
